actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from OMB.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from VA.
Committee on Veterans received executive comment from VA.
Committee on Veterans. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 917 ordered to be reported.
Committee on Veterans received executive comment from OMB.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Veterans' Administration to furnish memorial headstones and markers to commemorate veterans who by choice are buried at sea, who donate their bodies to science, or who are cremated and have their ashes scattered without interment.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to furnish a memorial headstone or marker to commemorate any veteran whose remains are unavailable because of a donation to science, a burial at sea, or other causes. Directs the Administrator to set aside suitable areas in national cemeteries to honor such veterans.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Veterans' Administration to furnish memorial headstones and markers to commemorate veterans who by choice are buried at sea, who donate their bodies to science, or who are cremated and have their ashes scattered without interment.
